name: secret-werewolf
description: 秘密人狼 - リアルタイム多人数ゲーム

scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/shared build && pnpm -C packages/worker build && pnpm -C packages/client build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C packages/shared typecheck && pnpm -C packages/worker typecheck && pnpm -C packages/client typecheck
scripts.lint: pnpm -C packages/shared lint && pnpm -C packages/worker lint && pnpm -C packages/client lint
scripts.test: pnpm -C packages/shared test && pnpm -C packages/worker test && pnpm -C packages/client test
scripts.clean: pnpm -C packages/shared clean && pnpm -C packages/worker clean && pnpm -C packages/client clean
scripts.deploy:full:prod: pnpm build && pnpm deploy:prod && pnpm -C packages/client build:production
